title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.10 - Repairs and tire changes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.10 - Repairs and tire changes

State Regulations

No person shall make a repair to a vehicle or change a tire
thereon in or upon the vehicular crossing unless authorized to do so by a
bridge employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
604.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
